Solar Power

This category of solar product includes solar panels and solar inverters. Solar panel is a packaged interconnected assembly of solar cells also known as photovoltaic cells. The solar panel is used as a component of a larger photovoltaic system to generate and supply electricity in commercial and residential applications. The energy created by our solar panels is clean and reliable. Solar inverter performs the conversion of the variable DC output of solar panel into utility frequency AC current for your home.

Solar Hot Water

If you calculate how much energy is utilized to get the hot water in your home, you will come to know that about 30% of your electricity bill is caused from hot water source. By purchasing our solar hot water system, you can save a great amount of your money. We have two structures in solar hot water; flat plates and evacuated tubes. You can place solar hot water on roof tank or on ground tank; Wherever you like you can ask us to fix it on the place of your choice.

Solar Heating/Cooling

We at Solar Megamart have created the one of its kind solar heating and cooling technology. Our product Solamate is design by the industry experts to heat or cool your home depending on the season or outer atmosphere. This single product will provide both winter heating and summer cooling.
